thread.title: Movies opening this week: Oct. 16 - Movies
thread.title_full: Movies opening this week: Oct. 16 - Movies - NorthJersey.com

author: The Record
title: Movies opening this week: Oct. 16 - Movies
text:
Buy this photo — From news service reports Tom Hanks portrays Brooklyn lawyer James Donovan in the Steven Spielberg film "Bridge of Spies." In theaters Friday: 
Bridge of Spies 
* Who's who: Tom Hanks, Mark Rylance, Amy Ryan.
* What's what: Steven Spielberg directs Hanks in this thriller (co-written by Joel and Ethan Coen) about a Brooklyn lawyer assigned by the CIA to negotiate the release of a pilot being held captive by the Soviet Union during the Cold War.
Goosebumps 
* Who's who: Jack Black, Dylan Minnette, Odeya Rush.
* What's what: Black plays author R.L. Stine in this scary-funny adaptation of his popular children's horror novels.
Crimson Peak 
* Who's who: Tom Hiddleston, Jessica Chastain, Mia Wasikowska.
* What's what: Director Guillermo del Toro returns to the fantastical horror turf of "Pan's Labyrinth" with this tale about the goings-on inside a creepy house in the mountains where a man lives with his sister (Chastain) and his new bride (Wasikowska).
Truth 
* Who's who: Robert Redford, Cate Blanchett, Topher Grace.
* What's what: Redford is Dan Rather and Blan-chett is news producer Mary Mapes in this recounting of the controversial "60 Minutes" report about a series of memos regarding President George W. Bush's military record that was later retracted.
— From news service reports
